ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | f1rhm0to0.a | |- A = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | f1rhm0to0.b | |- B = ( Base ` S ) |
| 3 |  | f1rhm0to0.n | |- N = ( 0g ` S ) |
| 4 |  | f1rhm0to0.0 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_rhmghm | |- ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) -> F e. ( R GrpHom S ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ X e. A ) -> F e. ( R GrpHom S ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 4, 3 | #P_ghmf1 | |- ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) -> ( F : A -1-1-> B <-> A. x e. A ( ( F ` x ) = N -> x = .0. ) ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ X e. A ) -> ( F : A -1-1-> B <-> A. x e. A ( ( F ` x ) = N -> x = .0. ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = X -> ( F ` x ) = ( F ` X ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( x = X -> ( ( F ` x ) = N <-> ( F ` X ) = N ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqeq1 | |- ( x = X -> ( x = .0. <-> X = .0. ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_imbi12d | |- ( x = X -> ( ( ( F ` x ) = N -> x = .0. ) <-> ( ( F ` X ) = N -> X = .0. ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_rspcv | |- ( X e. A -> ( A. x e. A ( ( F ` x ) = N -> x = .0. ) -> ( ( F ` X ) = N -> X = .0. ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ X e. A ) -> ( A. x e. A ( ( F ` x ) = N -> x = .0. ) -> ( ( F ` X ) = N -> X = .0. ) ) ) |
| 15 | 8, 14 | #P_sylbid | |- ( ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ X e. A ) -> ( F : A -1-1-> B -> ( ( F ` X ) = N -> X = .0. ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_ex | |- ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) -> ( X e. A -> ( F : A -1-1-> B -> ( ( F ` X ) = N -> X = .0. ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_com23 | |- ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) -> ( F : A -1-1-> B -> ( X e. A -> ( ( F ` X ) = N -> X = .0. ) ) ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_3imp | |- ( ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ F : A -1-1-> B /\ X e. A ) -> ( ( F ` X ) = N -> X = .0. ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( X = .0. -> ( F ` X ) = ( F ` .0. ) ) |
| 20 | 4, 3 | #P_ghmid | |- ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) -> ( F ` .0. ) = N ) |
| 21 | 5, 20 | #P_syl | |- ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) -> ( F ` .0. ) = N ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ F : A -1-1-> B /\ X e. A ) -> ( F ` .0. ) = N ) |
| 23 | 19, 22 | #P_sylan9eqr | |- ( ( ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ F : A -1-1-> B /\ X e. A ) /\ X = .0. ) -> ( F ` X ) = N ) |
| 24 | 23 | #P_ex | |- ( ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ F : A -1-1-> B /\ X e. A ) -> ( X = .0. -> ( F ` X ) = N ) ) |
| 25 | 18, 24 | #P_impbid | |- ( ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ F : A -1-1-> B /\ X e. A ) -> ( ( F ` X ) = N <-> X = .0. ) ) |
\
 Alternate proof for ~ f1rhm0to0 .  Using ~ ghmf1 does not make the proof shorter and requires disjoint variable restrictions! (Contributed by AV, 24-Oct-2019.)  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
